description: rippling green water in LLQ; rocky edge of land in white, pink, cream and mauve pigments in LRQ, with fabric covered post rising from cliff in right and moving upwards into URQ; mountains in blue and white pigments in ULQ; green sky with purple edging across top edge of image
provenance: (Roger Genser, Santa Monica, Calif., until 2017, sold to Kinney); Marla J. Kinney, Minneapolis (2017-19)
signed: LLC, in red pencil: m.a. Royds
title: Prayer Flags
